text: Agelak kɨlop pen agak, Depid ne bɨlel bɨne okok ayɨp yuwan gek, God kal ak amjakɨlak agak. Amjakɨl, Depid God kal ak mɨgan amɨl bilet dɨl, dad bɨne okok ayɨp ñɨŋɨlak agak. Bilet anɨb ak God wɨdɨn mɨdup adek ak lɨpal ak, bɨ yokɨp ma ñɨbal, bɨ God nop sɨbogep okok nep ñɨbal agak. Depid nop yuwan gek bilet dɨl ñɨŋak kesɨm anɨb ak, buk Baybol kɨl tɨkɨlak ak, nɨbi ma nepɨm akaŋ agak?
